item.title: US-based Video Editor with a Passion for Youtube - Upwork
item.description:
I have a personal brand Youtube channel in the cold email outreach education niche.

Rather than being completely serious, my style has incorporated more of a goofy vibe.  It's going for a Ryan Trahan or Biaheza style.

I'm able to do the raw cut of the video but need help with the more intricate cuts, transitions, music, and final polish.  Most importantly, I am looking for someone who can edit with a sense of humor into the content.

Please send samples with your proposal and I'm looking forward to meeting you!



Hourly Range: $30.00-$60.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 02:46 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Production for new product - Upwork
item.description:
I am launching a new product and I want to do a series of short instructional videos, 1 to 2 minutes in length, to help people understand my concept.  I would need videographer who can also edit.   

Hourly Range: $25.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 02:36 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Videography
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Videography

item.title: Video editor youtube - Upwork
item.description:
Looking to hire an experienced video editor for a car YouTube Channel.  specialized in European cars
Videos similar to:

https://www.youtube.com/@qmusclecars
https://www.youtube.com/@pd07

If you have experience video editing in the cars YouTube niche, feel free to apply and let's talk more details!

This is a long term collaboration with good payment structure.


Hourly Range: $36.00-$60.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 02:32 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Education, Explainer Video, Video Intro & Outro, Audio Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Education, Explainer Video, Video Intro & Outro, Audio Editing
